title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Designing Informatics Research Programs Based on Mixed-Methods Research

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students can understand core concepts of mixed research methodologies (quantitative/qualitative) and apply them to actual research designs.

Learners will apply at least three mathematical modeling techniques (regression analysis, clustering, anomaly detection, etc.) to a given dataset (e.g., network traffic logs, anomaly detection data) in the security and information analysis field and present data interpretations in a 10-page research report with visualizations.
Through team-based collaboration, learners can systematically analyze complex information problems and visualize/present results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
